QuestData.Title: Leave None Standing
QuestData.Description:
Now you see what my father refuses to acknowledge. De blood trolls are slaughtering us, and dey need to be stopped.
Our plan is simple, $n. We will go out dere and kill as many of dese blood trolls as we can. You go east, I go north.
Meet with me after and we will see what is left to do. We will teach dese blood trolls to fear de Zandalari!
